title: A good day
author: VD
content_html:
First, Spacebunny alerted me to the arrival of…THE LANDMARK HERODOTUS! It’s not on the short list for the next book study, but it’s a really lovely book. By the way, if your paperback Thucydides fell apart too, let me know. I took a picture of mine and I’m contacting the publisher, so perhaps we can arrange for an exchange or something.

Also, I finally managed to get not one, but TWO high scores on our Wii Fit. Spacebunny is absolutely crushing me at nearly everything; at one point, the only thing I had the high score on was pushups, she had the other 60 or whatever. Now, it’s true that she spends rather more time on it than I do, but even so, it’s just been an all-around horrible performance by me.
content_text:
First, Spacebunny alerted me to the arrival of…
THE LANDMARK HERODOTUS!
It’s not on the short list for the next book study, but it’s a really lovely book.  By the way, if your paperback Thucydides fell apart too, let me know.  I took a picture of mine and I’m contacting the publisher, so perhaps we can arrange for an exchange or something.
Also, I finally managed to get not one, but TWO high scores on our Wii Fit.  Spacebunny is absolutely crushing me at nearly everything; at one point, the only thing I had the high score on was pushups, she had the other 60 or whatever.  Now, it’s true that she spends rather more time on it than I do, but even so, it’s just been an all-around horrible performance by me.
